title: [NA] [Gold] Smashing Warhammers hosting tryouts.
body:
Hello all F0undry here; I am trying to build this discord channel with my buddy. We are looking to start off by making 2 league teams, starting and sub roster to compete in tournaments and clash. The idea of 2 teams is to have a main team, but both teams with a captain and practice schedule of their own, but that way we have subs available for both teams. We are looking for players of ALL ROLES, gold-platinum players only at this time.

There is not a scheduled tryout time, I need to get players in the channel first!

Please join the discord channel, under the "tryout information" category please copy and paste the following, and you will be assigned a role asap.

IGN:
RANK:
ROLE:
OP.GG:

In the future there will be openings for staff applications.

Add me on discord for further inquiries, questions, and for the discord: F0undry #8301
